content: marker it doesn t matter which one it is it just matters that it remains the same this heel is written through the 72 stitch size whatever size you are knitting stop on the row that leaves you with 24 stitches round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 repeat round 2 k2 *sl1 k1* to 2 stitches before the marker k2 repeat round 3 knit round 4 k2 *k1 sl1* to 2 stitches before the marker k2 repeat round 5 as round 1 round 6 as round 4 round 7 knit tread heavy socks for personal use only do not reproduce © 2022 bethany hight yourgreathightness@gmail com
